If principal hypothesis correct , overall daily fat balance might decrease human fed diet enrich OA . This would potential significance treatment prevention obesity . In order address hypothesis , propose follow double-masked , randomize control trial . Indirect calorimetry perform fed fast state young , healthy adult study two condition : 30-day , supervised , solid food diet 30-day formula diet . The subject randomize receive either Control Formula Diet macronutrient fatty acid composition solid food diet ( OA=PA=16.4 % total kcal ) High Oleic Acid Formula Diet ( OA=31.4 % total kcal PA=1.7 % total kcal ) . The Control Diets ( solid liquid ) provide amount ( per kcal ) total fat , saturate fat , OA similar 50-75th percentile intake young adult Americans intake total fat saturate fat recommend optimal long-term health . The High OA Formula Diet design simulate fat source Mediterranean Diet . The High OA diet result 167 % increase intake/kcal OA sn-1 sn-3 position dietary triacylglycerol .
